title: wtf takes years to get a new champ
body:
i am playing since like 3 or 4 days more than 8 games per day and still cant buy lulu! its like 10 games for 550 blue essence,,,,,6joutd non stop playing for f 600 blue essence.... sm fun

when i lvl up, which takes years, i get a dumb capsule with 500 or 600 blue essence....also, why do i have to spend blue essence for fiora lvl 6? so dumb....i ll quit league, takes way to long to buy anything if u dont spend real money/

replies.body: This is how it has always been. First win and mastery chests are a good source of content, and buying champs at full price is not.
Yep. that's how the old system worked too. It took me a month or more of play to buy aatrox.
it really doesn't, but to be fair, it forces you to actually practice the champs you already have rather then impulse buy whatever FOTM champ is next on your list
Hear me out, THEY REMOVED THE REWARD FOR WINNING A GAME
Unlike mobile legends, new hero every month
The blue essence system is just a way of forcing you into using real money. I know riot need money and this game needs funding but the system is abysmal.
BE gives higher averages than IP did. Get off the circlejerk train.
There has been lots of math based threads that said the opposite, don't be too sure.
